<title level="1" pfs="">[Tristian (Level 10)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2400)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Tristian (Level 10)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2400)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 69</row>

**Perception** +18; (expert) [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +17, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), _[+1 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, [greater healer's gloves](/Equipment.aspx?ID=444), [minor healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186), [Healer's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [religious text of Sarenrae](/Equipment.aspx?ID=42), ring of fire resistance, _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_, [greater staff of healing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=357), [silver religious symbol of Sarenrae](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), wand of heal, [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 128

**Resistances**
fire 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +13 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_? +14 ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 29, attack +19
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=238), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302)
- **2nd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258), [Shield Other](/Spells.aspx?ID=281)
- **3rd**
[Neutralize Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269)
- **4th**
[Blazing Blade](/Spells.aspx?ID=1233), [Dawnflower's Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1234), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250)
- **5th**
[Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×5)

**Cleric Domain Spells 3 Focus Points,** DC 29, attack +19
- **5th**
[Fire Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=422), [Healer's Blessing](/Spells.aspx?ID=426), [Rebuke Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=446)

**[Celestial Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=1360)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  

**Ancestry Feats**   [Angelkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1348), [Cooperative Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=67), [Natural Ambition](/Feats.aspx?ID=70) ([Healing Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=267))

**Class Feats**   [Advanced Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=285) (Healing), [Communal Healing](/Feats.aspx?ID=271), [Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=265) ([fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13)), [Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=265) ([Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15)), [Healing Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=267), [Selective Energy](/Feats.aspx?ID=283), [Turn Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=274)

**General Feats**   [Fleet](/Feats.aspx?ID=784), [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855)

**Skill Feats**   [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) (Survival), [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760), [Continual Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=771), [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814), [Robust Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=836), [Student of the Canon](/Feats.aspx?ID=847), [Ward Medic](/Feats.aspx?ID=864)

**Class Abilities**   Alertness, Deity ([Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16)), Divine Spellcasting, Divine Font (heal), Doctrine ( <%CLASS.DOCTRINES%1%%> cloistered cleric <%END>), Resolve

</column>
name: Tristian (Level 10)
